ygData.msgSnippet: 1) Teleportation is allowed as an introduction only. Primus may be in there, but it still is banned by the rules. 2) The idea to bring Unicron has the objetive

Subject: OOC: Decisions ((Nic)) --> Polar, Jerame, everybody else too
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=140463140
X-Yahoo-Profile: warriorazure

1) Teleportation is allowed as an introduction only. Primus may be 
in there, but it still is banned by the rules.

2) The idea to bring Unicron has the objetive to make intersting RPG 
experiences. To reach that objetive, current chars have to develop 
their weapons and skills in order to defat him... Impossilbe??? Not 
so.  Remember when the aparently weak defeats the mighty Minions. 
They're NPCs, so we'll make it possible the way it is. The solar 
flare idea ruins that because it threatens Earth and simply gets to 
kill Unicron in one shot. Killing him like this ruins the whole 
point and the fun of the game. Try something else that will allow 
everyone to get through the battle. 

If you want to tell us of your concept in order to make it more 
legal (speaking to everyone), you're welcome.
